intro: Justicia madrensis, commonly known as Madreño justicia, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking tubular flowers that range in color from blue to purple. The plant typically grows in rocky or limestone soils and thrives in full sun. It has lance-shaped leaves and is often found in arid or semi-arid environments. Due to its ornamental value, it is cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
